类 GameLogic

java.lang.Object
AllClass.GameLogic
public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
作者:
Comsys-ned20

  • 字段概要

    字段 
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    private int[][] game
    game : The game board behind the scene that record the location of each piece on the board
    private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> move
    move : The arraylist that records every moves. 2 index represents a singal move

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    boolean canPlay​(int x, int y)
    GameLogic.canPlay(int x, int y) This method checks if a player is able to place its own piece at the given location
    boolean checkCol​(int x, int y, int piece)
    checkCol(int x, int y, int piece) This method checks to see if a player win by having 5 or more of the same piece in a column
    boolean checkDiagonal​(int x, int y, int piece)
    checkDiagonal(int x, int y, int piece) This method checks whether a player win by having 5 or more of the same piece diagonally.
    boolean checkRow​(int x, int y, int piece)
    GamLogic.checkRow(int x, int y) This method check whether the player win by having 5 or more in a row

    GameLogic.checkSize() It checks the size of the arrayList

    GameLogic.clearBoard() This method clears the board as well as the arrayList that records the moves.
    int[] goBack_One()
    goBack_One() This method removes the move recent move that is made by one of the players based on the moves stored in the ArrayList.
    int[] goBack_Two​(AllClass.AIhard ai)
    goBack_Two() This method removes the two most recent moves made by the ai and the player.

  • 方法详细资料

    • play

      public void play​(int x, int y, int piece)
      GameLogic.play(int x, int y, piece) This method is used to place down a piece at a desired location on the board behind the scene
      参数:
      int - x --> coordinate
      int - y --> coordinate
      int - piece --> the type of piece, 1 is black and 2 is white

    • play

      public void play​(int x, int y, int piece, AllClass.AIhard ai)
      GameLogic.play(int x, int y, piece, AIhard ai) This method is used to place down a piece at a desired location on the board behind the scene. It also calls the AIhard class to tell the ai that the player made a move
      参数:
      int - x --> coordinate
      int - y --> coordinate
      int - piece --> the type of piece, 1 is black and 2 is white
      AIhard - ai --> the ai that is used

    • setEmpty

      public void setEmpty​(int x, int y)
      GameLogic.setEmpty(int x, int y) This method allows you to set a spot on the board empty
      参数:
      int - x --> coordinate
      int - y --> coordinate

    • checkRow

      public boolean checkRow​(int x, int y, int piece)
      GamLogic.checkRow(int x, int y) This method check whether the player win by having 5 or more in a row
      参数:
      x - --> coordinate
      y - --> coordinate
      piece - --> the piece that the player own
      返回:
      boolean --> true if the player win by 5 or more in a row, false if not

    • checkCol

      public boolean checkCol​(int x, int y, int piece)
      checkCol(int x, int y, int piece) This method checks to see if a player win by having 5 or more of the same piece in a column
      参数:
      x - --> coordinate
      y - --> coordinate
      piece - --> type of chess
      返回:
      boolean --> true if win, false if not

    • checkDiagonal

      public boolean checkDiagonal​(int x, int y, int piece)
      checkDiagonal(int x, int y, int piece) This method checks whether a player win by having 5 or more of the same piece diagonally.
      参数:
      x - --> coordinate
      y - --> coordinate
      piece - --> desired piece
      返回:
      boolean --> true if player win, false if player did not

    • canPlay

      public boolean canPlay​(int x, int y)
      GameLogic.canPlay(int x, int y) This method checks if a player is able to place its own piece at the given location
      参数:
      x - --> coordinate
      y - --> coordinate
      返回:
      boolean --> true if the spot is empty, false if not

    • checkWin

      public boolean checkWin​(int x, int y, int go)
      GameLogic.checkWin(int x, int y, int piece) This method checks to see if a player win the game
      参数:
      x - --> coordinate
      y - --> coordiante
      go - --> the kind of piece that the player own
      返回:
      boolean --> true of the player win the game, false if the player did not

    • clearBoard

      public void clearBoard()
      GameLogic.clearBoard() This method clears the board as well as the arrayList that records the moves.

    • clearBoard

      public void clearBoard​(AllClass.AIhard ai)
      GameLogic.clearBoard() This method clears the board as well as the arrayList that records the moves. It also calls the ai class to clear the board that is used by the AI

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard()
      GameLogic.printBoard() This method print the board behind the scene in the console. This is mainly used when testing the program

    • goBack_One

      public int[] goBack_One()
      goBack_One() This method removes the move recent move that is made by one of the players based on the moves stored in the ArrayList.
      返回:
      int[] --> It returns the coordinate of the removed piece

    • goBack_Two

      public int[] goBack_Two​(AllClass.AIhard ai)
      goBack_Two() This method removes the two most recent moves made by the ai and the player. It then calls another method in the AI class so that it also tell the ai that moves are being cancelled.
      参数:
      ai -
      返回:

    • checkSize

      public int checkSize()
      GameLogic.checkSize() It checks the size of the arrayList
      返回:
      int --> the size of the arrayList
